metadata.dc:author: Rivarés Esteban, J J
Marín García, J
Campos del Alamo, M A
Gil Paraíso, P J
Navarro Díaz, F
Martín Martín, J M
metadata.dc:description: Reporting the case of a man, 70-year-old, suffering a chronic obstructive lung disease of moderate degree linked to important Reinke's oedema, who underwent a tracheotomy, being troubled the immediate postoperative period with subcutaneous emphysema and pneumomediastinitis, complications resolved favourably in a ten days term, and the patient could be decannulated.
metadata.dc:title: Enfisema subcutáneo cervico-torácico y neumomediastino tras traqueotomía.
[Subcutaneous cervico-thoracic emphysema and pneumo-mediastinum following a tracheostomy].
